data.name: My boss is weird
data.detailed_description:
game introduction


"My boss is weird" is a game that AVG chooses to play as the core. The game tells about a white man who is suspected to be a peeper for no reason, in order to prove his innocence. In the game, players will face a series of choices, some of which seem small, but lead to different results.

*Multiple choice narrative experience: one main line and several plot lines enrich the player's experience

*Card selection interaction: while the game plot is advancing, the players need to make a choice through the cards. Every choice has an impact on your emotional intelligence, good will, physical strength and money. Whether you choose to surrender or fight, it's all at your fingertips.

*For the first time, comics, games and interactive narration are combined to let players experience different feelings

*The Japanese sound is excellent.

*The game currently only has the first chapter content, and subsequent chapters will be gradually opened.

Character introduction

data.short_description: "My boss is weird" is a career AVG choice play as the core of the game, the game about a workplace Xiaobai, was inexplicably suspected as a peeper, in order to prove his innocence. In the game, players will face a series of choices, some of which seem small, but lead to different results.
data.supported_languages:
English, Japanese*, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX11 capabilities
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX11 capabilities
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 400 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:

content_descriptors.notes:
This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Sexual Content, General Mature Content

All characters involved in sexual content are over the age of 18.
